'''Vayuda Turquoises''' are gemstones of varying quality used in the [[Character#Ascensions|ascension]] of {{Anemo}} [[character]]s.

==Types==
{{Material Quality
|2=Vayuda Turquoise Sliver
|3=Vayuda Turquoise Fragment
|4=Vayuda Turquoise Chunk
|5=Vayuda Turquoise Gemstone
}}

==Full Description==
"Still, the winds change direction."<br>
"Someday, they will blow towards a brighter future..."<br>
"Take my blessings and live leisurely from this day onward."

==Trivia==
* <section begin="VayudaQuote" />The Vayuda Turquoise quote is paraphrased by [[Venti]] in the {{Quest|A Long Shot}}.<section end="VayudaQuote" />

===Etymology===
* The English name for this item derives "Vayuda" from {{w|Vayu}}, a primary Hindu deity who is the lord of winds.
* In the Chinese version, Vayuda is instead called {{zh|自在|zìzai|tl=free, unrestrained,}} which is possibly also a reference to the Chinese name for the concept of {{w|Ishvara}} in Buddhism and Hinduism.
